solution.text:
Volume of reservoir \(=_{{j*k*l*1000}}_\,litres\)
Volume is to be increased by \(_{{m*10000}}_\,litres\).
New Volume\(=_{{j*k*l*1000}}_+_{{m*10000}}_=_{{j*k*l*1000+(m*10000)}}_\,litres\)
\(=_{{j*k*l+m*10}}_\,m^3\)
New Volume\(=l \times b \times h_2\)
\(\Rightarrow _{{j*k*l+m*10}}_=_{j}_ \times _{k}_ \times h_2\)
\(\Rightarrow\)New depth of reservoir, \(h_2 = \frac{_{{j*k*l+m*10}}_}{_{j}_ \times _{k}_}\)
New depth of reservoir \(=_{{trunc(((j*k*l+m*10)/(Decimal(j)*k)),3)}}_\,m\)

content.text: In order to increase the storage capacity by \(_{{m*10000}}_\,litres\), what should be the new depth of the reservoir?
